# r4np

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The `r4np` package is the companion for the book [R For Non-Programmers: A Guide for Social Scientists](https://github.com/ddauber/R-for-Non-Programmers "R For Non-Programmers")

## Installation

You can install the released version of r4np from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("r4np")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ddauber/r4np")
```
